data.name: Life with College Girl
data.detailed_description:
üíòCHECK THIS OUT!üíò

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870310/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1994010/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1925010/


About the Game

‚óÜFeatured Systems

‚óáFull CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.
‚óáPressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system

‚óÜStory

As an engineer, apart from a decent salary, I didn't have any personal life at all, let alone a girlfriend.
During the rainy and melancholic winter, a female college girl called "Snow" appeared in my life.

Snow was innocent and lovely, gentle but with a little devilish character. She had a smile like the sunshine, but she always looked sad at some points.
Not only did Snow ask to live with me before the end of winter, she also asked to have unprotected sex with me on the first day we met. Claiming it was her first time and asking me to be gentle, she said she was on the pill...?

As we lived together and went on trips together, I slowly got to know Snow and became closer to her, but I could still feel that there were many things she did not want to tell me.
She was fine with me doing all sorts of erotic things with her, but never said anything about her feelings for me.
And what about me? What were my feelings for Snow?

When winter passed, would our relationship fade like melting snow, or could I try to make a change‚Ä¶?

‚óÜGameplay Instructions

During the days when you live with Snow, you can choose to ‚ÄúWatch TV‚Äù, ‚ÄúChat with Snow‚Äù or ‚ÄúGo out early in the morning‚Äù (increase money) in the morning of workdays. In the evening, you can choose to ‚ÄúChat‚Äù with Snow, to ‚ÄúHave sex. You can also ‚ÄúShop online‚Äù to buy various clothes and items, which not only allows Snow to "Dress up", but also allows you to start various role plays and enjoy your happy days with Snow.
On Sundays, you can go on trips with Snow, and every choice you make will have an impact on the final outcome of your relationship with her.

data.short_description: I met a girl named Snow on the Internet, and she turned out to asked me to live with her! What's even more amazing is that the first day I brought her home, she asked to live with me without a condom. What story is hidden behind the Snowy in front of me ......?
data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese*, Thai, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • Additional Notes:

  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug abuse, self-harm, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
